description: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.
stars: Lee Yeong-ae, Lee Byung-hun, Kang-ho Song, Kim Tae-Woo

description: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.
stars: Julia Jentsch, Fabian Hinrichs, Alexander Held, Johanna Gastdorf

description: A tale about a strange young man, Bulcsú, the fellow inspectors on his team, all without exception likable characters, a rival ticket inspection team and racing along the tracks - and a tale about love.
stars: Sándor Csányi, Eszter Balla, Zoltán Mucsi, Csaba Pindroch

description: A cop from the provinces moves to Paris to join the Anti-Crime Brigade of Montfermeil, discovering an underworld where the tensions between the different groups mark the rhythm.
stars: Damien Bonnard, Alexis Manenti, Djebril Zonga, Issa Perica

description: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.
stars: Lee Jung-jae, Choi Min-sik, Jung-min Hwang, Park Sung-woong

description: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.
stars: Tom Schilling, Sebastian Koch, Paula Beer, Saskia Rosendahl

movie: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
description: In this action-packed comedy, Nicolas Cage plays Nick Cage, channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan (Pedro Pascal) and a CIA agent (Tiffany Haddish).
stars: Nicolas Cage, Pedro Pascal, Tiffany Haddish, Sharon Horgan

description: Enter the relentless pressure of a restaurant kitchen as a head chef wrangles his team on the busiest day of the year.
stars: Stephen Graham, Vinette Robinson, Alice Feetham, Ray Panthaki

description: After an emotional exchange between a Lebanese Christian and a Palestinian refugee escalates, the men end up in a court case that gets national attention.
stars: Adel Karam, Kamel El Basha, Camille Salameh, Diamand Bou Abboud

description: Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.
stars: Johannes Krisch, Irina Potapenko, Andreas Lust, Ursula Strauss

description: Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.
stars: Sergey Makovetskiy, Sergey Garmash, Apti Magamaev, Nikita Mikhalkov

description: A young Palestinian freedom fighter agrees to work as an informant after he's tricked into an admission of guilt by association in the wake of an Israeli soldier's killing.
stars: Adam Bakri, Leem Lubany, Eyad Hourani, Samer Bisharat

description: Dima Nikitin is an ordinary honest plumber who suddenly decides to face the corrupt system of local politics in order to save the lives of 800 inhabitants of an old dormitory, which is about to collapse.
stars: Artyom Bystrov, Natalya Surkova, Yuriy Tsurilo, Boris Nevzorov

description: Bill struggles to put together his shattered psyche, in this new feature film version of Don Hertzfeldt's animated short film trilogy.
stars: None

description: On the last Wednesday before the spring solstice ushers in the Persian New Year, people set off fireworks following an ancient Zoroastrian tradition. Rouhi, spending her first day at a new job, finds herself in the midst of a different kind of fireworks -- a domestic dispute between her new boss and his wife.
stars: Hamid Farokhnezhad, Hediyeh Tehrani, Taraneh Alidoosti, Pantea Bahram

description: East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them.
stars: Friedrich Mücke, Karoline Schuch, David Kross, Alicia von Rittberg
